tuv.seg: Getting married is a big step and will significantly impact on lots of areas in your life
Is céim mhór é an pósadh agus beidh tionchar suntasach aige ar a lán réimsí i do shaol
Find out about the legal requirements and procedures involved in getting married in Ireland and abroad
Faigh eolas ar na riachtanais agus ar na gnáthaimh dhlíthiúla a bhaineann leis an bpósadh in Éirinn agus thar lear
Legal implications of a broken engagement
Na himpleachtaí dlíthiúla a bhaineann le gealltanais bhriste
When an engaged couple decide not to marry, are there any implications for gifts they have jointly received?
An bhfuil aon impleachtaí ann, nuair a shocraíonn beirt gan phósadh, do na brontannais a fuair siad mar bheirt?
What are the rules on property?
Cad iad na rialacha maidir le maoin?
A pre-nuptial agreement is an agreement entered into by a couple before they get married
Comhaontú ina n-iontrálann lánúin sula bpóstar iad is ea comhaontú réamhphósta
This document describes legal prerequisites that both parties must fulfil in order to have the legal capacity to marry each other
Tá cur síos anseo ar na réamhriachtanais dleathúla nach mór don bheirt a chomhlíonadh le bheith in ann a chéile a phósadh
If they lack capacity under any heading the marriage would be void at law in Ireland
Muna shásaíonn siad beirt na rialacha ar fad bheadh an pósadh neamhbhailí
Notification requirements for marriage
Riachtanais fógartha don phósadh
This section outlines the notification procedure which both parties to a marriage must fulfil in order to be legally entitled to marry
Tá cur síos sa chuid seo ar an bhfógra trí mhí nach mór don dá pháirtí i bpósadh a thabhairt ionas go mbeidh siad i dteideal pósadh go dlíthiúil
Different legal ways of getting married
Bealaí dlíthiúla difriúla le bheith pósta
There are different ways you can get legally married in Ireland
Tá bealaí difriúla inar féidir leat pósadh go dleathach in Éirinn
Find out about both secular and religious ceremonies that have legal effect in this country
Faigh amach faoi shearmanais thuata agus reiligiúnacha le héifeacht dhlíthiúil sa tír seo
Religious and secular marriage ceremonies
Searmanais an phósta reiligiúnacha agus saolta
Procedure for getting married by the rites and ceremonies of a number of different religions in Ireland
Nós imeachta chun pósadh faoi dheasghnátha agus searmanais roinnt reiligiún éagsúil in Éirinn
(Includes information on marriage by licence, after the banns or by Registrar's Certificate)
(Eolas ar phósadh le ceadúnas, tar éis na bannaí nó le Teastas an Chláraitheora i gceist ann freisin)
Getting married by Civil Ceremony (in a Registry Office) in Ireland, including notification of the Registrar
Ag pósadh trí Shearmanas Sibhialta (in Oifig Chláraithe) in Éirinn, ina áirítear fógra a thabhairt don Chláraitheoir
How marriages are registered in Ireland
Conas mar a chláraítear póstaí in Éirinn
Also refers the reader to the other sections which cover this issue in more detail
Atreoraíonn sé an léitheoir chuig na rannóga a thugann níos mó sonraí faoin ábhar seo
Instructions on where and how to get a Marriage Certificate and costs
Treoracha maidir le cén áit agus cén chaoi a bhfaighfeá Teastas Pósta agus costais
Information for Irish citizen(s) on how to ensure your marriage abroad is legally valid in Ireland
Eolas do shaoránach/shaoránaigh Éireannacha maidir le conas a chinntiú go bhfuil do phósadh thar lear bailí de réir an dlí in Éirinn
